name: Docker Proxy Setup
description: Configure Docker proxy and daemon settings

http_proxy.description: HTTP proxy URL or "none" to disable

https_proxy.description: HTTPS proxy URL or "none" to disable

no_proxy.description: Comma-separated list of hosts that should be excluded from proxy

insecure_registries.description: Comma separated list of insecure registries

log_file.description: File path for docker-proxy setup logs

settings.github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr: Use the Docker proxy setup feature to configure Docker to work behind a proxy.
